00068 
00069 double Op_Diff_VEF_Face_Q1::calculer_dt_stab() const
00070 {
00071 // La diffusivite est constante dans le domaine donc
00072 // 
00073 // dt_diff = h*h/diffusivite
00074   remplir_nu(nu_);
00075   double dt_stab;
00076   const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_vef.valeur();
00077   double alpha = local_max_vect((diffusivite_pour_pas_de_temps().valeurs()));
00078   if (alpha==0)
00079     dt_stab = DMAXFLOAT;
00080   else
00081     dt_stab = 0.5*zone_VEF.carre_pas_du_maillage()/(2.*dimension*alpha);
00082   return dt_stab;
00083 }
00084 
00085 // Fonction utile visc_Q1
00086 
00087 double visc_Q1(const Zone_VEF& la_zone,int num_face,int num2,
00088                int num_elem,int dimension,DoubleTab& nu)
00089 {
00090   double constante = nu(num_elem)/la_zone.volumes(num_elem)*la_zone.porosite_elem(num_elem);
00091   double Valeur=0;
00092 
00093   if(dimension==2)
00094     {
00095       Valeur=la_zone.face_normales(num_face,0)*
00096              la_zone.face_normales(num2,1) -
00097              la_zone.face_normales(num_face,1)*la_zone.face_normales(num2,0);
00098       Valeur=constante*dabs(Valeur)*(la_zone.porosite_face(num_face)* la_zone.porosite_face(num2));
00099     }
00100   else if (dimension == 3)
00101     {
00102       Valeur=(la_zone.face_normales(num_face,1)*la_zone.face_normales(num2,2) -
00103               la_zone.face_normales(num_face,2)*la_zone.face_normales(num2,1)) +
00104              (la_zone.face_normales(num_face,2)*la_zone.face_normales(num2,0) -
00105               la_zone.face_normales(num_face,0)*la_zone.face_normales(num2,2)) +
00106              (la_zone.face_normales(num_face,0)*la_zone.face_normales(num2,1) -
00107               la_zone.face_normales(num_face,1)*la_zone.face_normales(num2,0));
00108       Valeur=constante*dabs(Valeur)*(la_zone.porosite_face(num_face)* la_zone.porosite_face(num2));
00109     }
00110 // Cerr << "Valeur " << Valeur << finl;
00111   return Valeur;
00112 }
00113 
00114 DoubleTab& Op_Diff_VEF_Face_Q1::ajouter(const DoubleTab& inconnue, DoubleTab& resu) const
00115 {
00116   remplir_nu(nu_);
00117   const Zone_Cl_VEF& zone_Cl_VEF = la_zcl_vef.valeur();
00118   const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_vef.valeur();
00119   const IntTab& elem_faces = zone_VEF.elem_faces();
00120   const IntTab& face_voisins = zone_VEF.face_voisins();
00121   int n1 = zone_VEF.nb_faces();
00122   int nb_comp = 1;
00123   int nb_dim = resu.nb_dim();
00124   if(nb_dim==2)
00125     nb_comp=resu.dimension(1);
00126 
00127   int i,j,num_face;
00128   int elem1,elem2;
00129   int nb_faces_elem = zone_VEF.zone().nb_faces_elem();
00130   double val;
00131 
00132 // On traite les faces bord
00133   for (int n_bord=0; n_bord<zone_VEF.nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00134     {
00135       const Cond_lim& la_cl = zone_Cl_VEF.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00136 
00137       const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00138       int num1 = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00139       int num2 = num1 + le_bord.nb_faces();
00140 
00141       if (sub_type(Periodique,la_cl.valeur()))
00142         {
00143           const Periodique& la_cl_perio = ref_cast(Periodique,la_cl.valeur());
00144           int fac_asso;
00145           for (num_face=num1; num_face<num2; num_face++)
00146             {
00147               elem1 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00148               fac_asso = la_cl_perio.face_associee(num_face-num1)+num1;
00149               for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00150                 {
00151                   if ( ( (j= elem_faces(elem1,i)) > num_face ) && (j != fac_asso ) )
00152                     {
00153                       val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem1,dimension,nu_);
00154 
00155                       for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00156                         {
00157                           resu(num_face,nc)+=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00158                           resu(num_face,nc)-=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00159                           resu(j,nc)+=0.5*val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00160                           resu(j,nc)-=0.5*val*inconnue(j,nc);
00161                         }
00162                     }
00163                 }
00164               elem2 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00165               for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00166                 {
00167                   if ( ( (j= elem_faces(elem2,i)) > num_face ) && (j != fac_asso ) )
00168                     {
00169                       val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem2,dimension,nu_);
00170                       for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00171                         {
00172                           resu(num_face,nc)+=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00173                           resu(num_face,nc)-=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00174                           resu(j,nc)+=0.5*val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00175                           resu(j,nc)-=0.5*val*inconnue(j,nc);
00176                         }
00177                     }
00178                 }
00179             }
00180         }
00181       else
00182         {
00183           for (num_face=num1; num_face<num2; num_face++)
00184             {
00185               elem1 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00186               for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00187                 {
00188                   if ( (j= elem_faces(elem1,i)) > num_face )
00189                     {
00190                       val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem1,dimension,nu_);
00191                       for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00192                         {
00193                           resu(num_face,nc)+=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00194                           resu(num_face,nc)-=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00195                           resu(j,nc)+=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00196                           resu(j,nc)-=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00197                         }
00198                     }
00199                 }
00200             }
00201         }
00202     }
00203 
00204 // On traite les faces internes
00205   for (num_face=zone_VEF.premiere_face_int(); num_face<n1; num_face++)
00206     {
00207       elem1 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00208       elem2 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00209 
00210       for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00211         {
00212           if ( (j=elem_faces(elem1,i)) > num_face )
00213             {
00214               val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem1,dimension,nu_);
00215               for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00216                 {
00217                   resu(num_face,nc)+=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00218                   resu(num_face,nc)-=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00219                   resu(j,nc)+=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00220                   resu(j,nc)-=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00221                 }
00222 
00223             }
00224           if ( (j=elem_faces(elem2,i)) > num_face )
00225             {
00226               val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem2,dimension,nu_);
00227               for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00228                 {
00229                   resu(num_face,nc)+=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00230                   resu(num_face,nc)-=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00231                   resu(j,nc)+=val*inconnue(num_face,nc);
00232                   resu(j,nc)-=val*inconnue(j,nc);
00233                 }
00234             }
00235         }
00236     }
00237 
00238 // Partie imposee :
00239   int nbcomp = resu.dimension(1);
00240   for (int n_bord=0; n_bord<zone_VEF.nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00241     {
00242       const Cond_lim& la_cl = zone_Cl_VEF.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00243 
00244       if (sub_type(Neumann_paroi,la_cl.valeur()))
00245         {
00246           const Neumann_paroi& la_cl_paroi = ref_cast(Neumann_paroi, la_cl.valeur());
00247           const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00248           int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00249           int nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
00250           for (int face=ndeb; face<nfin; face++)
00251             for (int comp=0; comp<nbcomp; comp++)
00252               resu(face,comp) += la_cl_paroi.flux_impose(face-ndeb,comp)*zone_VEF.surface(face);
00253         }
00254       else if (sub_type(Echange_externe_impose,la_cl.valeur()))
00255         {
00256           const Echange_externe_impose& la_cl_paroi = ref_cast(Echange_externe_impose, la_cl.valeur());
00257           const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00258           int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00259           int nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
00260           for (int face=ndeb; face<nfin; face++)
00261             for (int comp=0; comp<nbcomp; comp++)
00262               resu(face,comp) += la_cl_paroi.h_imp(face-ndeb,comp)*(la_cl_paroi.T_ext(face-ndeb)-inconnue(face,comp))*zone_VEF.surface(face);
00263         }
00264     }
00265 
00266   modifier_flux(*this);
00267   return resu;
00268 }
00269 
00270 DoubleTab& Op_Diff_VEF_Face_Q1::calculer(const DoubleTab& inconnue, DoubleTab& resu) const
00271 {
00272   resu = 0;
00273   return ajouter(inconnue,resu);
00274 }

00280 //
00281 
00282 void Op_Diff_VEF_Face_Q1::ajouter_contribution(const DoubleTab& transporte, Matrice_Morse& matrice ) const
00283 {
00284   remplir_nu(nu_);
00285   const Zone_Cl_VEF& zone_Cl_VEF = la_zcl_vef.valeur();
00286   const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_vef.valeur();
00287   const IntTab& elem_faces = zone_VEF.elem_faces();
00288   const IntTab& face_voisins = zone_VEF.face_voisins();
00289   int n1 = zone_VEF.nb_faces();
00290   const int nb_comp = transporte.line_size();
00291 
00292   int i,j,k,num_face,elem1,elem2;
00293   int nb_faces_elem = zone_VEF.zone().nb_faces_elem();
00294 // DoubleTab val= 0;
00295   double val;
00296   IntVect& tab1 = matrice.get_set_tab1();
00297   IntVect& tab2 = matrice.get_set_tab2();
00298   DoubleVect& coeff = matrice.get_set_coeff();
00299 
00300 // On traite les faces bord
00301   for (int n_bord=0; n_bord<zone_VEF.nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00302     {
00303       const Cond_lim& la_cl = zone_Cl_VEF.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00304 
00305       const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00306       int num1 = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00307       int num2 = num1 + le_bord.nb_faces();
00308 
00309       if (sub_type(Periodique,la_cl.valeur()))
00310         {
00311           const Periodique& la_cl_perio = ref_cast(Periodique,la_cl.valeur());
00312           int fac_asso;
00313           for (num_face=num1; num_face<num2; num_face++)
00314             {
00315               elem1 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00316               fac_asso = la_cl_perio.face_associee(num_face-num1)+num1;
00317               for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00318                 {
00319                   if ( ( (j= elem_faces(elem1,i)) > num_face ) && (j != fac_asso ) )
00320                     {
00321                       val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem1,dimension,nu_);
00322                       for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00323                         {
00324                           for (k=tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00325                             {
00326                               if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00327                                 coeff(k)+=val;
00328                               if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00329                                 coeff(k)-=0.5;
00330                             }
00331                           for (k=tab1[j*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[j*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00332                             {
00333                               if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00334                                 coeff(k)-=val;
00335                               if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00336                                 coeff(k)+=0.5*val;
00337                             }
00338                         }
00339                     }
00340                 }
00341               elem2 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00342               for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00343                 {
00344                   if ( ( (j= elem_faces(elem2,i)) > num_face ) && (j != fac_asso ) )
00345                     {
00346                       val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem2,dimension,nu_);
00347                       for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00348                         {
00349                           for (k=tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00350                             {
00351                               if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00352                                 coeff(k)+=val;
00353                               if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00354                                 coeff(k)-=0.5*val;
00355                             }
00356                           for (k=tab1[j*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[j*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00357                             {
00358                               if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00359                                 coeff(k)-=val;
00360                               if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00361                                 coeff(k)+=0.5*val;
00362                             }
00363                         }
00364                     }
00365                 }
00366             }
00367         }
00368       else
00369         {
00370           for (num_face=num1; num_face<num2; num_face++)
00371             {
00372               elem1 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00373               for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00374                 {
00375                   if ( (j= elem_faces(elem1,i)) > num_face )
00376                     {
00377                       val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem1,dimension,nu_);
00378                       for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00379                         {
00380                           for (k=tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00381                             {
00382                               if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00383                                 coeff(k)+=val;
00384                               if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00385                                 coeff(k)-=val;
00386                             }
00387                           for (k=tab1[j*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[j*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00388                             {
00389                               if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00390                                 coeff(k)-=val;
00391                               if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00392                                 coeff(k)+=val;
00393                             }
00394 
00395                         }
00396                     }
00397                 }
00398             }
00399         }
00400     }
00401 
00402 // On traite les faces internes
00403   for (num_face=zone_VEF.premiere_face_int(); num_face<n1; num_face++)
00404     {
00405       elem1 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00406       elem2 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00407 
00408       for (i=0; i<nb_faces_elem; i++)
00409         {
00410           if ( (j=elem_faces(elem1,i)) > num_face )
00411             {
00412               val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem1,dimension,nu_);
00413               for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00414                 {
00415                   for (k=tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00416                     {
00417                       if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00418                         coeff(k) += val;
00419                       if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00420                         coeff(k) -= val;
00421                     }
00422                   for (k=tab1[j*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[j*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00423                     {
00424                       if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00425                         coeff(k) -= val;
00426                       if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00427                         coeff(k) += val;
00428                     }
00429                 }
00430             }
00431           if ( (j=elem_faces(elem2,i)) > num_face )
00432             {
00433 // E Saikali : can not factorize more
00434               if (nb_comp == 1)
00435                 {
00436                   for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00437                     {
00438                       val = visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem2,dimension,nu_);
00439                       for (k=tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00440                         {
00441                           if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00442                             coeff(k)+=val;
00443                           if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00444                             coeff(k)-=val;
00445                         }
00446                       for (k=tab1[j]-1; k<tab1[j+1]-1; k++)
00447                         {
00448                           if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00449                             coeff(k)-=val;
00450                           if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00451                             coeff(k)+=val;
00452                         }
00453                     }
00454                 }
00455               else
00456                 {
00457                   val= visc_Q1(zone_VEF,num_face,j,elem1,dimension,nu_);
00458                   for (int nc=0; nc<nb_comp; nc++)
00459                     {
00460                       for (k=tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[num_face*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00461                         {
00462                           if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00463                             coeff(k)+=val;
00464                           if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00465                             coeff(k)-=val;
00466                         }
00467                       for (k=tab1[j*nb_comp+nc]-1; k<tab1[j*nb_comp+nc+1]-1; k++)
00468                         {
00469                           if (tab2[k]-1==num_face*nb_comp+nc)
00470                             coeff(k)-=val;
00471                           if (tab2[k]-1==j*nb_comp+nc)
00472                             coeff(k)+=val;
00473                         }
00474                     }
00475                 }
00476 
00477             }
00478         }
00479     }
00480 
00481 }
00482 
00483 void Op_Diff_VEF_Face_Q1::contribue_au_second_membre(DoubleTab& resu ) const
00484 {
00485   const Zone_Cl_VEF& zone_Cl_VEF = la_zcl_vef.valeur();
00486   const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_vef.valeur();
00487   const int nb_comp=resu.line_size();
00488 
00489 // Partie imposee :
00490   for (int n_bord=0; n_bord<zone_VEF.nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00491     {
00492       const Cond_lim& la_cl = zone_Cl_VEF.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00493 
00494       if (sub_type(Neumann_paroi,la_cl.valeur()))
00495         {
00496           const Neumann_paroi& la_cl_paroi = ref_cast(Neumann_paroi, la_cl.valeur());
00497           const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00498           int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00499           int nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
00500           for (int face=ndeb; face<nfin; face++)
00501             for (int comp=0; comp<nb_comp; comp++)
00502               resu(face,comp) += la_cl_paroi.flux_impose(face-ndeb,comp)*zone_VEF.surface(face);
00503         }
00504     }
00505 }
00506
